results.name: Least even pseudoprime > p to base p, where p = prime(n).
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Fermat Pseudoprime.
Index entries for sequences related to pseudoprimes
mathematica: a[n_] := Module[{p = Prime[n]}, k = p+1; If[OddQ[k], k++]; While[GCD[p, k] != 1 || PowerMod[p, k, k] != p, k+=2]; k]; Array[a, 100] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Sep 10 2019 *)
xref: Cf. A006935 (Even pseudoprimes (or primes) to base 2: n divides 2^n - 2, n even).
results.author: _Alexander Adamchuk_, May 26 2007
